summary: Completed comprehensive testing of mushroom blog application. Backend APIs working correctly, but AI image generation blocked by Gemini API billing requirements. Frontend has authentication/routing issues preventing full admin workflow testing.

critical_bugs.issue: Gemini Imagen API returns 400 INVALID_ARGUMENT - 'Imagen API is only accessible to billed users at this time'
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks core AI blog generation feature completely

working_endpoints.status: ✅ Working - Both valid and invalid password handling correct

ui_bugs.issue: Admin authentication not persisting properly in browser context, causing redirects to homepage
Create New Blog button becomes unclickable after viewing a blog and returning to dashboard

integration_issues.issue: Frontend will show error when AI generation fails due to API key limitations

working_features: ✅ Homepage loads with proper mushroom theme
✅ Published blogs display correctly on homepage
✅ Individual blog pages render with markdown content
✅ Blog cards are clickable and navigate correctly

success_percentage.backend: 75% (6/8 endpoints working, AI generation blocked by API key)
success_percentage.frontend: 60% (public features working, admin workflow has authentication issues)

critical_priority: Fix Gemini API key issue - current key doesn't have access to Imagen API for image generation. Need to either upgrade to billed account or implement fallback for image generation.
Fix admin authentication persistence in CreateBlog component - users are being redirected to homepage instead of staying on create blog page.
medium_priority: Fix dashboard navigation issue where Create New Blog button becomes unclickable after viewing blogs
Add proper error handling for AI generation failures in the frontend
low_priority: Consider adding loading states and better UX for AI generation delays
Add fallback image placeholder when AI image generation fails
